meanings.definition: A device attached to a vehicle to prevent skidding on wet roads.
meanings.sent1: The aquaplaners on the car helped it stay safe on the rainy road.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to check if the aquaplaners are properly installed on your vehicle before driving in the rain.
meanings.sent3: The aquaplaners decided to take a break from work and go for a spin around the block.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like aquaplaners, guiding him through the slippery slopes of life.
meanings.sent5: The aquaplaners hummed softly as they kept the car steady on the wet highway.

meanings.sent1: The skilled aquaplaners knew exactly how to handle the device in any weather condition.
meanings.sent2: As an aquaplaners, she always made sure to have the necessary equipment ready for a rainy day.
meanings.sent3: The aquaplaners joked that they were the real superheroes of the road, saving cars from skidding.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was like that of an aquaplaners, always ready to navigate through any challenge.
meanings.sent5: The aquaplaners' expertise was evident as they effortlessly guided the vehicle through the rainstorm.
